channel.title: Ecosystem on Mryqu's Notes

item.title: [MapR培训笔记] Hadoop生态系统
item.description: - SQL: Language designed for querying & transformingdata held in a relational database management system. - NoSQL: Database model that’s not necessaryly held intabular format. Often, NoSQL refers to data that is flat or nestedin format. - Log Data: Information captured about organization’sinternal system, external customer interactions & how they’reused - Streaming Data: Twitter, Facebook, Web click data, Webform data. - Flume: Reliable, scalable service used to collectstreaming data in Hadoop cluster.
